page.title: 14HOME LIFE(cont.)
page.content: 7.30 Adam gets up and asks for a bowl of Rice Krispies.At 7.45 he dresses.He likes to wear B.M.X. T-shirts and shorts. 8.00 He cycles up the road to his nan's house,while his mum goes shopping. 9.00 He rides his bike to a friend's house where he stays until his friend has dinner. 12.00 Adam has dinner. He likes beans on toast. Then he plays with his toys,especially Matchbox cars and transformers. 2.30 He swims in his pool in the garden. 4,00 Adam dresses and goes out on his bike. 5.00 He has a cup of tea and biscuits. 5.30 Adam watches T.V. 7.00 He has a bath and goes to bed. Adam is 6 years old.
